title: BOC User can Edit the Daily Transaction Bulletin
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user is a BOC user
custom_steps: WHEN clicking "pencil" icon for any row on Daily Transaction Bulletin
custom_expected:
THEN the Daily Transaction Bulletin will reload row in edit mode
AND "x" (cancel) icon will display instead of "pencil" (edit) icon

title: BOC User can Save the Daily Transaction Bulletin
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user is a BOC user
AND made edits to a Daily Transaction Bulletin
custom_steps: WHEN clicking Save in edit mode
custom_expected:
THEN the bulletins and its current values will save
AND a successful save blue notification will display
AND clicking "x" icon will cancel any changes to row and return to view mode

title: BOC User can re-order transactions on Daily Transaction Bulletin
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user is a BOC user
custom_steps:
WHEN in edit mode of the Daily Transaction Bulletin
AND clicking and holding on the icon on the far left of each row
custom_expected:
THEN user can drag rows to a new location within the same Org
AND saving will maintain the new order of Daily Tx Bulletin

title: BOC User can mark which transactions to hold back when the Daily Transaction Bulletin is sent
custom_preconds: GIVEN user is a BOC user
custom_steps:
WHEN the DTB row is in edit mode
AND "Hold" checkbox is checked
AND DTB is sent
custom_expected:
THEN row on "Hold" will remain under "pending" bulletin
AND will not display in the latest bulletin sent
AND save will reload in view mode
AND the Hold checkboxes will retain the changes

title: BOC User can create the Daily Transaction Bulletin
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user is a BOC user
custom_steps:
WHEN the transaction bulletin is in View or Edit mode
AND clicking the SEND Bulletin button
custom_expected:
THEN it will save any changes made, take the current Pending Bulletin and build the Transaction Bulletin - assigning it an ID and adding it to the "Date" dropdown at the top of the page as "{Current Date} - {Transaction ID#}"
AND any transactions that are checked as "Hold" will NOT be added to the new bulletin
AND will instead roll to the next Pending bulletin
AND the "Hold" checkbox will remain checked
AND a new Pending bulletin will be created and be available in the "Date" dropdown

title: Bulletin Email should contain PDF attachment if there are Entries
custom_preconds: GIVEN there are entries on the Daily Transaction Bulletin
custom_steps:
WHEN user Sends or Resends bulletin
AND user is on email list
custom_expected: THEN user will receive an email with a PDF attachment
